info.description: API for Sijunjung Go application with multi-role authentication support
info.title: Sijunjung Go API

get.description: Get all accounts filtered by role (Super Admin only)

post.description: Create a new Admin, Merchant, or Mitra account (Super Admin only)

400.description: Invalid request or email already exists

get.description: Get a single account by ID (Super Admin only)

put.description: Update an account's full name and/or email (Super Admin only)

delete.description: Permanently delete an account (Super Admin only)

post.description: Reset an account's password and return the new password (Super Admin only)
Authenticate Super Admin or Admin with email and password
Authenticate user with email and password to get bearer token (legacy endpoint, use /api/user/login instead)
Authenticate merchant with email and password
Authenticate mitra with email and password

delete.description: Permanently delete the current user account and all associated data

post.description: Authenticate or register user with Facebook access token

get.description: Redirects user to Google OAuth consent page for login/registration

post.description: Authenticate or register user with Google ID token from mobile client (Flutter)

get.description: Handle callback from Google OAuth and return JWT token

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password (validates role=user)
Revoke the current access token and optionally the refresh token

parameters.description: Logout request with optional refresh token
parameters.name: request

get.description: Get the current authenticated user information including role

post.description: Use a refresh token to get a new access token and refresh token pair
Register a new user with full name, email, and password. Sends OTP to email for verification.

400.description: Invalid request or email already exists

post.description: Resend the OTP code to email (1 minute cooldown)

400.description: User not found or cooldown active

429.description: Please wait before requesting new code

post.description: Reset password by sending a new random password to user's email

400.description: User not found or invalid request

get.description: Check if Sijunjung service is running

post.description: Verify the OTP code sent to email and get bearer token
Send an OTP code to the specified WhatsApp number (1 minute cooldown)

429.description: Please wait before requesting new code

post.description: Verify the OTP code sent to WhatsApp

model.CreateAccountRequest.description: Request body for creating a new account by Super Admin

model.GoogleMobileAuthRequest.description: Request body for Google authentication from mobile apps (Flutter)

model.LogoutRequest.description: Request body for logout (optional refresh token to revoke)

model.RefreshTokenRequest.description: Request body for refreshing access token

model.SendWhatsAppOTPRequest.description: Request body for sending OTP via WhatsApp

model.UpdateAccountRequest.description: Request body for updating an account

model.VerifyWhatsAppOTPRequest.description: Request body for verifying WhatsApp OTP

BearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
